title: The Mandalorian trailer teases an epic Star Wars adventure with Pedro Pascal
text:
With just two weeks until it debuts on the brand new Disney Plus streaming service, the new trailer for The Mandalorian has been unveiled.

Pedro Pascal stars as the title character, a mysterious bounty hunter in the new series, set after the fall of the Empire in the original Star Wars movie trilogy and before the rise of the First Order in the most recent movie trilogy.

The trailer also features more of actor/filmmaker Werner Herzog, and while his character has yet to be revealed, appears to be giving some advice to the title character.

New trailer: With just two weeks until it debuts on the brand new Disney Plus streaming service, the new trailer for The Mandalorian has been unveiled

Werner: The trailer also features more of actor/filmmaker Werner Herzog, and while his character has yet to be revealed, appears to be giving some advice to the title character.

The trailer opens with a shot featuring several Stormtrooper helmets strewn among the desert sand, before The Mandalorian (Pascal) walks through.

In Star Wars lore, a Mandalorian is a fictional race from the planet of Mandalore who largely go on to work as mercenaries or bounty hunters, such as Boba Fett.

The mysterious mentor played by Herzog states it's, 'a world more peaceful since the revolution,' adding that, 'it's a shame that your people suffered.'

Stormtroopers: The trailer opens with a shot featuring several Stormtrooper helmets strewn among the desert sand, before The Mandalorian (Pascal) walks through.

The Mandalorian is seen in his bounty hunter tactical gear, surveying the scene when he starts battling against a number of different foes.

One of the presumed foes is then seen being encapsulated in carbonite (just like Han Solo in Return of the Jedi) where Herzog's mystery character stating, 'but bounty hunting is a complex profession.'

The Mandalorian is then seen landing his ship in a mysterious territory where he heads into a cantina to meet Herzog's character.

Herzog's character is telling The Mandalorian that he, 'heard you were the best in the Parsec. Would you agree,' as he opens a door to a room filled with Stormtroopers.

The Mandalorian then takes out a number of the Stormtroopers along with a number of random scenes of this bounty hunter in action.

There are also brief glimpses of Carl Weathers' Greef Carga, Gina Carano's Cara Dune and Giancarlo Esposito's Moff Gideon.

The trailer ends with a number of random shots including a robot firing two weapons all around him and another with The Mandalorian and a mysterious female character.

Herzog's character says, 'Look outside. They are waiting for you' as The Mandalorian flies on top of the cockpit flown by Moff Gideon.

'Yeah? Good,' The Mandalorian says as he's seen pointing a large gun at somebody in the final scene of the trailer.

The Mandalorian launches on the Disney Plus streaming service when it debuts November 12.
